reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of MICB 201, MICB 202, BIOL 201, BIOL 203, BIOC 203. (Third-year standing.)
MICB 202 or BIOC 302 are also acceptable pre-requisites for FNH 405 - please contact LFS Student Services (students@landfood.ubc.ca) for assistance with registration.
courseName: Microbiology of Food and Beverage Fermentation
description: Fermentation methods, mechanism and microbiology of nonalcoholic fermented foods and alcoholic fermented beverages (beer, cider, sake).
